title: High Contrast Sans-Serif
content:
Can someone name that font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306im_/http:/typophile.com/files/32026_6306.gif)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [32026.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/typophile.com/files/32026.gif) | 52.32 KB |
author: Phillip Rodolfi

comments.content:
ops .. I found ...  
it is customized: [http://joel-arias.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/joel-arias.com/ "http://joel-arias.com/")

This is what happens when you tinker with Optima [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/") or another classic thick & thin sans...  
Don

Some you may like as alternatives: [Vanitas](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/reserves/vanitas), [Numskill](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/numskill), [Simply Grotesk JNL](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/simply-grotesk), [Stark Debonair](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/e-daylight.jp/design/fonts/type/s/stark-debonair.html), [Seaside](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/andrijtype/seaside), [Sang Bleu](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/www.swisstypefaces.com/fonts/sangbleu), [Carisma](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/carisma), [Contax Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeinnovations/contax-sans), [Patriciana](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/green-type/patriciana), [Euro Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/euro-sans-pro), [Tenor Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/www.behance.net/gallery/Tenor-Sans/3351597), [Minerva](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/minerva/), [Radiant OL](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ortizlopez/olradiant), [Carisma](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/carisma), [Grenale](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/grenale)

Good list of light weight thick & thin sans. Note: Tenor Sans is at [https://www.behance.net/gallery/Tenor-Sans/3351597](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113306/https:/www.behance.net/gallery/Tenor-Sans/3351597 "https://www.behance.net/gallery/Tenor-Sans/3351597")  
Don
